name: Quick Lingo
tag_list: legal-translation, marketing-translation, financial-translation, business-translation, medical-translation, book-translation, documentt-ranslation, professional-translation-services, london-translation-agency, website-translation
overview:
Quick Lingo is a London translation agency that provides high quality professional translation services to business clients based in the UK or abroad. The range of translation services includes legal translations, financial translations, medical translations and marketing translations. Company works with around 5000 certified mother-tongue translators in differenet countries. It provides translations in 100 languages. Cusomer service operates 24/7. Company also works with website translation and localisation.

Quick Lingo provides the following services:

  • Scientific & Medical Translation
  • Legal Documents Translation
  • Marketing Translation Services
  • Finance Translation
  • Business Translation Services
  • Interpretation Services
  • Website Translation Services
  • Technical Translation Services
